page.title: 08PLAYGROUND GAMES IN S.HARRIS
page.content: {FOOTBALL ROUNDERS LEVERBALL {TENNIS TIG HIDE AND SEEK {SQUASH POLEO DODGE BALL { {POLEO }_this is a game where one child {"IT"}stands at one end of the playground and the rest stand at the opposite end.{"IT"}shouts "Name a car" and the rest think of a type of car. Someone in the group asks "What car have you chosen?" She shouts to {"IT" }which models they have chosen.{ {"IT"}shouts the name of one of the models and all those who have chosen that one run to{"IT".}Whoever gets there first becomes {"IT"}. { {COUNTING RHYME}to decide who is{"IT".} _{"Ittle Ottle black bottle, {Ittle Ottle out. {If you want a piece and jam, {Please walk straight out."
